page.title: 08LIGHT INDUSTRY IN RISELEY
page.content: Mr Futter works at Instrument Engineering with four other people.His premises have been at 37, High Street,opposite the Five Bells for 12 years now.He makes complete machines. People ask him to make special machines for a particular job then he plans,builds it and tests it in the customer's workshop. His job is not finished until he has the machine working where it is to be used. All his machines are to do with welding,joining two pieces of metal together. Over the years he has made many "one off" machines for customers all over the country. He sells mostly to industry. He is working on a jet project in 1985. He has worked for many large companies and now exports to Europe and elsewhere.
